remarks: Convert an operation commutative law to class notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
statement:
caovcomg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x F y ) = ( y F x ) ) $.
caovcomd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
caovcomd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. S ) $.
caovcomd $p |- ( ph -> ( A F B ) = ( B F A ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
